SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , G.GPA_CD , G.STU_ID , G.GPA_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(G.GPA_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GPA_DATE , G.ATCH_FILE_ID , G.GPA_DNM , G.GPA_SUB , (SELECT COCO_STTS FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.COCO_CD=G.GPA_STATUS) AS GPA_STATUS , S.PROFE_ID AS PROF_ID -- 담당 교수 ID , P.NM AS STUDENT_NM -- 학생 이름 , PR.NM AS PROFESSOR_NM -- 교수 이름 FROM GRADUATION_PAPER G INNER JOIN STUDENT S ON G.STU_ID = S.STU_ID -- STUDENT와 조인 INNER JOIN PERSON P ON P.ID = S.STU_ID -- 학생의 이름 가져오기 INNER JOIN PERSON PR ON PR.ID= S.PROFE_ID -- 교수의 이름 가져오기 WHERE G.STU_ID = #{stuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT G.GPA_CD, G.GPA_NM, G.STU_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(GPA_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GPA_DATE, G.ATCH_FILE_ID, G.GPA_DNM, G.GPA_SUB, G.GPA_STATUS, G.GPA_REJECTION_REASON, A.FILE_SN, A.FILE_STRE_COURS, A.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM GRADUATION_PAPER G LEFT JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL A ON G.ATCH_FILE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE G.GPA_CD = #{gpaCd, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, GP.GPA_CD, GP.GPA_NM, GP.STU_ID, P.NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(GP.GPA_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GPA_DATE, GP.GPA_STATUS, P.NM AS STUDENT_NM FROM GRADUATION_PAPER GP JOIN STUDENT ST ON GP.STU_ID = ST.STU_ID JOIN PERSON P ON ST.STU_ID = P.ID JOIN PERSON PR ON ST.PROFE_ID = PR.ID WHERE PR.ID = #{profId}
